text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia lorioli is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 2 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Mediterranean Sea as an invasive species

"Odostomia lorioli". Gastropods.com. Retrieved 14 November 2011.
